title: kench should say that tasted purple when he eats lulu
body:
title

Maybe chogath could say it

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Baron of Bread,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lsvodZb2,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-04-20T08:23:24.750+0000)
>
> {{champion:223}} "My, what a distinctly violet flavor."

I read this in Tahm's voice
And when Lulu needs a gank she should say "Hey! {{champion:64}} "
or at least when he kills her... but people have been saying this since his release, so i doubt it'll happen :/
Well, unless they make a Legendary skin for Kench, there's no reason for them to bring in the voice actor to record a single line.

> [{quoted}](name=JaxMoonStealer,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lsvodZb2,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-04-20T14:28:19.794+0000)
>
> Well, unless they make a Legendary skin for Kench, there's no reason for them to bring in the voice actor to record a single line.

maybe it could be a quote for Legendary Kench to say :o (that is, if he keeps the eating people theme)

> [{quoted}](name=It Hertz When IP,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lsvodZb2,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-04-20T20:05:04.890+0000)
>
> {{item:3070}} {{champion:31}} {{item:3070}}

idea for new Cho'gath line when he finally gets his VGU? :D
Kinda like how Urgot has some unique quotes for ult executes.

> [{quoted}](name=It Hertz When IP,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lsvodZb2,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-04-20T20:05:04.890+0000)
>
> {{item:3070}} {{champion:31}} {{item:3070}}

Good idea ill add that to the post
{{champion:223}} "Not as purple as I thought. Yuckkk!"
